OWNER / INVESTOR,
SEDONA CANYON ESTATE

Sedona Canyon Estate is privately owned, debt free and allocated parcels for sale have clear titles, which makes the purchase simplified.

The first home that is currently under constructon on Sedona Canyon Estate is Phoenix Residence, which is due for completon in November of 2022

OWNER / INVESTOR,
SEDONA CANYON ESTATE

Sedona Canyon Estate is privately owned, debt free and allocated parcels for sale have clear titles, which makes the purchase simplified. The first home that is currently under constructon on Sedona Canyon Estate is Phoenix Residence, which is due for completon in November of 2022

DESIGN & PROJECT,
MANAGEMENT SHAKTICOLA

Established in 2012, Shakticola is a progressive full-service design to build project management company headed by Director Trevor Charles Morgan and the company is based in Galle Fort, Sri Lanka.

With extensive UK and international knowledge and expertise in commercial and residential sectors, they also offer full development management and architectural design services.

Shakticola’s project portfolio includes luxury villas along the southern coast of Sri Lanka. They have completed hotel builds such as Palm in Ahangama and the Salty Pelican in Hiriketiya Beach.

Trevor Morgan has now undertaken the design and project management of the 6-acre mountain-top property at Sedona Canyon Estate in Nakiyadeniya.

To view portfolio, please see www.shakticola.com

MANAGEMENT SHAKTICOLA

With extensive UK and international knowledge and expertise in commercial and residential sectors, they also offer full development management and architectural design services. THE BUILD,
CRYSTAL CONSTRUCTION

Crystal Construction were the top preferred builder for Sedona Canyon Estate. Located in Unawatuna, on the southern province of Sri Lanka, the company established their business in 2012 and focuses mainly on delivering high quality builds. Their commitment to each project is what makes them one of the best construction companies in Sri Lanka. Their work speaks for itself, www.crystalconstruction.com
